item.title: Embracer Group to divest Easybrain to Miniclip for $1.2 billion
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/embracer-group-to-divest-easybrain-to-miniclip-for-1-2-billion

Transaction expected to close in early 2025.

Embracere Group has entereted in an agreement to divest operative group Easybrain, which it acquired in 2021, to Miniclip for a consideration of $1.2 billion USD, the company announced. The transaction is expected to close in the first few months of 2025.

“This transaction transforms Embracer’s financial position and puts us in a stronger position to drive value,” said Embracer Group co-founder and CEO Lars Wingefors in a press release. “Easybrain has been an important part of the Embracer family for over three years, contributing to strong value creation during this time. As Easybrain’s market is transforming, Miniclip is the right strategic buyer to enable the company to stay at the forefront of the ad-driven mobile game industry. I would like to extend my gratitude to the founders and senior management Oleg Grushevich, Peter Skoromnyi and Matvey Timoshenko, who remain Embracer shareholders and the fantastic Easybrain team for their contributions to Embracer. I am confident that Easybrain will continue to innovate and achieve sustainable growth in the industry.”

Miniclip CEO Saad Choudri added, “We are delighted to welcome Easybrain to Miniclip. We have long admired Easybrain’s ability to build loyal and engaged puzzle game communities. The addition of evergreen franchises like Sudoku.com further reinforces our vision to engage a broad audience of players. Oleg and I have known each other for some time, and we are happy to be able to work together to deliver exceptional experiences for our players. The combination of Miniclip and Easybrain brings us closer to our vision of unleashing the gamer in everyone.”

Easybrain CEO Oleg Grushevich said, “Embracer has been a wonderful home for the Easybrain team—allowing us to focus on our business and grow in our unique way. We’re proud to have contributed to Embracer’s story and strength along the way, and we extend our sincere thanks to Lars for being an exceptional partner who has been supportive and trustworthy throughout. Today, Easybrain starts a new chapter, and we are confident that joining forces with Miniclip will enable us to leverage new strengths and deliver even more enriching experiences for our players. This is an inspiring new phase for the Easybrain team, and I’m excited to start working with Saad and look forward to a journey of innovation and growth together.”

item.title: Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii details ‘Mad Dog’ and ‘Sea dog’ battle styles, sidearms, Dark Instruments, and pirate battles
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/like-a-dragon-pirate-yakuza-in-hawaii-details-mad-dog-and-sea-dog-battle-styles-sidearms-dark-instruments-and-pirate-battles

Get the details below.

■ Battle Styles

Push Combat to the Extreme with Two Battle Styles

In addition to his signature Mad Dog style, which is all about speed, Majima can also use his Sea Dog style to wield a cutlass and other buccaneer gear. Pick the style that works for you—kick, pummel, and slash your way through the filthy bilge rats who stand in your way!

■ Fighting Styles

Mad Dog

The fighting style that earned the Mad Dog of Shimano his fearsome moniker in the criminal underworld. Majima blends together a combination of punches, kicks, and knife strokes to make quick work of his enemies. He can also launch his victims into the air and unleash flashy mid-air combos!

—Combos

Unleash a flurry of punches, kicks, and blade attacks on your foes! Follow up with flashy finishing blows and aerial combos!

—Heat Actions

These devastating attacks can be performed under certain conditions, such as when Majima is armed with an impromptu weapon or making use of his surroundings.

—Madness Gauge

While battling in the Mad Dog style, use the Madness Gauge to summon doppelgangers! These apparitions will fight by Majima’s side and can be used to dish out insane combination attacks.

Sea Dog

The fighting style that earned the Mad Dog of Shimano his fearsome moniker in the criminal underworld. Majima blends together a combination of punches, kicks, and knife strokes to make quick work of his enemies. He can also launch his victims into the air and unleash flashy mid-air combos!

—Combos

The Sea Dog style allows Majima to quickly lay waste to his foes using his cutlasses. He can also unlock triple finishers that utilize all three of his sidearms.

—Heat Actions

Majima’s Heat Actions make use of his cutlasses and sidearms. Embrace the pirate life and unleash waves of nautical nonsense upon your foes!

—Madness Gauge

Using the Madness Gauge, Majima can summon dark deities capable of turning the tides of battle. Conjuring them requires treasures known as Dark Instruments, which you’ll need to plunder from the ships of defeated rival pirate crews.

■ Sidearms and Dark Instruments

Collect sidearms and Dark Instruments to tap into the Sea Dog style’s full potential!

Sidearms

Three unique weapons that can be unlocked as you progress through the story.

Cutlass boomerang enables Majima to throw his cutlasses and damage enemies at a distance. His pistol can also be charged to deal extra damage. Lastly, he can latch on to enemies using his chain hook and zip towards them.

—Cutlass Boomerang

—Pistol

—Chain Hook

Dark Instruments

—Dark God of the Waves

Playing Majima’s cursed violin summons man-eating sharks to the battlefield! These beasts will emerge from the ground, dealing heavy damage to enemies within range of their jaws. Furthermore, the more enemies there are, the greater the number of sharks that will appear!

—Dark God of the Earth

Playing Majima’s cursed guitar calls upon a ferocious ape that inflicts massive damage on enemies. The deity makes up for its limited range with its sheer destructive force.

—Dark God of the Skies

Playing a tune on Majima’s cursed sax conjures an avian ally capable of conjuring up powerful winds! Enemies caught within its tornadoes will be blown into the air and suffer continuous damage.

—Dark God of the Deep

Blowing into Majima’s cursed ocarina beckons a terrifying jellyfish to emerge from the briny deep! This creature will heal Majima and his allies, as well as shock and immobilize nearby enemies.

■ Pirate Battles

Lead the Goro Pirates to battle on the high seas and etch your crew’s name into the annals of pirate history!

Captain the Goromaru as you explore the vast ocean! During your voyages, you’ll discover lighthouses, treasure islands, and various other locations. However, don’t forget to ready your cannons, as you may have to go to battle with the dangerous marauders that lurk in wait!

Maneuver around enemy bombardments and send volleys of cannonballs into their ship’s hull! Once it has taken enough damage, board their ship with your crew and brawl it out to secure victory!

You can also enter the Pirates’ Coliseum and face off against rival crews to earn fame and fortune beyond your wildest dreams!

To really kick arrrss in naval battles, you’ll need to modify your ship, strategically deploy your forces, and power up your crew! Meet over 100 recruitable seafarers, and modify your ship with options that range from different designs and decorations to armor and stronger cannons! Improve your ship and crew, scuttle some enemy vessels, and become a pirate of legend!

Cannon Battles

When fighting enemies at sea, it’s either sink or be sunk. Captain your ship as Majima—who can also make repairs or fire his rocket launcher at unsuspecting foes. Steer the Goromaru away from enemy fire, and bombard them with cannon volleys! Customizing the Goromaru is also key to victory! You can reinforce your ship’s deck or swap out the cannons for flamethrowers and lasers.

Deck Battles

Once you’ve weakened the enemy’s vessel, it’s time to storm their ship!

Seize the opposing ship by engaging in an all-out brawl. To claim victory, you’ll need to rely on Majima’s abilities and the crewmates you bring to battle. Each crewmate brings different skills to the table—some focus more on offense, while others offer more healing capabilities. With plenty of potential allies to recruit around Hawaii and Madlantis, you’ll need to assemble your very own crew of misifts and raise them into legendary pirates!

The Pirates’ Coliseum

The Pirates’ Coliseum in Madlantis is an arena like no other. Here, you’ll engage in naval battles with a variety of different rules: from one-on-one matches to chaotic free-for-alls against nine other crews! You’ll also encounter a variety of colorful opponents unique to the Pirates’ Coliseum, including a shady scientist, a pyromaniac, and even a sumo wrestler! All sorts of challenges await you, the Goromaru, and your trusty crew.

item.title: Turn-based battle board game Three Kingdoms HEROES announced for Apple Arcade
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/turn-based-battle-board-game-three-kingdoms-heroes-announced-for-apple-arcade

  • Smartphone

Due out on January 9, 2025.

Koei Tecmo has announced Three Kingdoms HEROES, a turn-based battle board game based on the Romance of the Three Kingdoms franchise. It will launch for Apple Arcade on January 9, 2025.

Here is an overview of the game, via Apple Arcade:

About

Clash in a battle of wits and chess-like strategy, and create your unique team from a myriad of famous generals from Koei Tecmo’s Romance of the Three Kingdoms intellectual property.

Attain Victory Through Tactical Wits!

A simple yet profound strategy game. Immerse yourself in a full-fledged turn-based battle board game where victory hinges solely on wits and strategy!

Drawing inspiration from timeless classics like Shogi and Chess, “Three Kingdoms HEROES” combines turn-based combat with unique unit movements. In place of numerical stats, units boast unique “Stratagems” or “Skills,” reminiscent of the generals in “Romance of the Three Kingdoms.” Experience a simple yet intricate gameplay through the combination of these two mechanics!

Challenge the Genius AI “GARYU” in Single-player Mode

In single-player mode, face off against “GARYU,” an AI specializing in tactical warfare tuned specifically for Three Kingdoms HEROES. With various difficulty levels ranging from beginner to advanced, experience the thrill of strategic battles against this formidable opponent.

The genius AI “GARYU” is created by HEROZ, the developers of the Shogi AI “dlshogi,” which dominated the World Computer Shogi Championships for two consecutive years.

Heroes of the Three Kingdoms with unique Stratagems and Skills

Famous generals from the “Romance of the Three Kingdoms” series come to life with iconic visuals and voices. Strategically assemble your squad, unlock new generals and battle against other players or top-class AI opponents! Explore new combinations and strategies by leveraging each general’s unique stratagems or skills and lead your army to victory!

Hone Your Skills Against the Genius Ai “GARYU” and Compete Against Players From All Over the World on Apple Arcade

Embark on an epic journey and experience legendary battles of the “Three Kingdoms” in “Campaign” Mode. Challenge your skills against the formidable AI “GARYU” in a high difficulty “AI Match,” or compete against players from all over the world in a “Seasonal Match.” For more personalized battles, play against your friends and family in “Private Match”!

item.title: The First Berserker: Khazan – G-Star 2024 gameplay
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/the-first-berserker-khazan-g-star-2024-gameplay

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Mount Heinmach stage and the Volbaino boss fight.

Publisher Nexon and developer Neople have released two new gameplay videos for action RPG The First Berserker: Khazan as part of G-Star 2024, which runs from November 14 to 17 at Busan Exhibition and Convention Center in Busan, South Korea.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nexon:

The First Berserker: Khazan is a hardcore action RPG developed by Neople for PC and consoles, set within the multiverse of the Dungeon & Fighter universe. The game brings Dungeon Fighter Online‘s signature dynamic action to consoles, while unfolding a brutal tale of revenge through the story of Khazan. Its unique 3D cel-shaded animation-style graphics enhance the dramatic atmosphere and deliver intense, immersive action. Following showcases at Gamescom 2024 and Tokyo Game Show 2024, The First Berserker: Khazan‘s hands-on demo [at G-Star 2024] will allow players to explore its initial area, Heinmach, and engage in fierce battles with the bosses “Volbaino” and “Rangkus,” showcasing the game’s unique hardcore action elements.

The First Berserker: Khazan is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam in early 2025.

item.title: Infinity Nikki launches December 5
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/infinity-nikki-launches-december-5

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Smartphone

Cozy open-world adventure game dated.

Free-to-play open-world dress-up adventure game Infinity Nikki will launch for PlayStation 5, PC via client download and Epic Games Store, iOS via App Store, and Android via Google Play on December 5, publisher Infold Games and developer Papergames announced.

A pre-order-exclusive bundle is currently available to pre-order via PlayStation Store for $9.99 / £7.99 / €9.99 / ¥1,540, which includes the following bonus content:

  • In-game item for Resonance: “Resonite Crystal” x3
  • In-game currency: “Bling” x20,000
  • Crafting materials for Outfits: “Thread of Purity” x50
  • Growth materials for Outfits: “Shiny Bubble” x10
  • Growth materials for Eurekas: “Shining Particle” x2

Here is a message from producer Runhao Yao on the game’s release:

Dear Stylist,

Hello, everyone. I’m Runhao Yao, producer of the Nikki series. I want to personally thank each of you for your continued support and patience. Today, we’re thrilled to announce that Infinity Nikki will officially release across multiple platforms on December 5—a date that holds special meaning for us. Twelve years ago, on this very day, we released our first game in the beloved Nikki series, Nikki Up2U: A Dressing Story. Now, our fifth Nikki game is finally ready to meet you.

The first Nikki game was created by just a few of us, but today, the Infinity Nikki team has grown to more than one thousand people. Bringing this “one-of-a-kind” project to life has been challenging, with far more complexity in development and management than we ever anticipated. It’s been tough, but our determination carried us through. Our team has always believed in taking on the impossible, and because this was a Nikki project, we were even more motivated and inspired to pursue “infinity” with everything we had.

These last 12 years have been a long but precious journey for both the Nikki series and our team. Thank you to everyone who has played Nikki in the past, those who enjoy it now, and those who will join us in the future. If you’re planning to try Infinity Nikki, we hope it brings you joy.

—Runhao Yao, Producer

Here is an overview of the game, via Infold Games:

About

Infinity Nikki is the fifth installment in the beloved Nikki series developed by Infold Games. Utilizing Unreal Engine 5, this multi-platform, open-world dress-up adventure seamlessly blends the series’ core dress-up mechanics with open-world exploration elements. It also offers platforming, puzzle-solving, and many other gameplay elements to create a unique and rich experience.

In this game, Nikki and Momo embark on a new adventure to travel across the fantastical nations of Miraland, each with its own unique culture and environment. Players will encounter many characters and whimsical creatures while collecting stunning outfits of various styles. Some of these outfits possess magical abilities that are crucial for exploration.

Whimsical Adventure with Endless Fun

Harnessing the power of Whim that’s hidden within outfits, Nikki has the tools to help her overcome difficult trials. Her courage and determination know no bounds.

The Floating Outfit allows Nikki to hover gracefully, the Gliding Outfit summons a giant flower for high-altitude flights, and the Shrinking Outfit lets her sit on Momo’s head as he navigates through small spaces. These Ability Outfits open up many possibilities for adventure and thus offer an endless amount of fun!

In this vast, fantastical world, master techniques such as floating, running, and plunging to freely explore the land as well as tackle cleverly designed puzzles and levels. The joy of 3D platforming is interwoven throughout the game’s open-world exploration. Each unique scenery is vibrant and charming. Soaring paper cranes, speeding wine cellar minecarts, mysterious ghost trains—new mysteries are waiting to be unraveled!

Wonderful Moments with Endless Immersion

Miraland is also a fantastic place for you to relax and appreciate life.

With sunrises, sunsets, and the ever-changing weather, the creatures of Miraland have their own lives. Remember their daily routines and try to find them! Wear outfits with special abilities to fish by the river or catch bugs with a net. The game features an in-depth gathering system where the items Nikki collects become great clothing materials.

Stroll through flower fields and meadows, walk along mountain streams, and encounter merchants offering special outfits. Let your inspiration rise with the paper cranes on the streets. Use Momo’s Camera and dress Nikki up in your favorite outfits. You can choose the perfect backgrounds and frames to take pictures of her, capturing every heartwarming moment of your journey anytime, anywhere.

It’s Glam Time Any Time!

Thank you for being interested in Infinity Nikki. We look forward to meeting you in Miraland!

item.title: Idol Maker VR announced for PS VR2
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/idol-maker-vr-announced-for-ps-vr2

  • PS VR2
  • PS5

Due out on November 21.

Publisher CFK and developer Yeda Entertainment have announced virtual reality raising simulation game Idol Maker VR for PlayStation VR2. It will launch via PlayStation Store on November 21 for $14.99 / 1,490 yen with English, Japanese, Korean, and Traditional Chinese language support.

Here is an overview of the game, via CFK:

About

Here you have a girl who dreams to become a superstar. You, a rookie guardian angel, have descended to the human world in order to help a girl achieve her earnest dream.

Which paths will your choices lead her down? As her guardian angel, guide her to become the superstar everyone dreams of becoming.

Key Features

  • Duties as Guardian Angel – You have five years until the girl becomes an adult. Through your coaching as guardian angel, raise the girl to get all eyes on her and turn her into a star. Develop her idol talents through various experiences and training methods. All sorts of futures await depending on your guidance.
  • For the Greatest Debut – Show off the results of your persistent training at your audition! Take part in regular auditions to show the judges all the talents you’ve honed thus far. Who knows what good things lie in store if you don’t give up and keep at it?
  • Rearing is Important Into Adulthood! – It’s good to achieve these big dreams, but it’s also important to help raise a healthy adult. Check and utilize her condition stats to balance training and a healthy lifestyle. Create a systematic development plan for the girl’s future.
